Information

These Texts is a collection of messages I‚Äôve received from people I know, or knew at some point. The messages are organized chronologically.

While the messages date back as far as 2014, I began collecting and posting them in September 2016. The project is somewhat inspired by Jamie Livingston‚Äôs Some Photos of That Day, Miranda July‚Äôs We Think Alone, and the slew of similar stuff already out there.

Questions, comments, concerns? Text me.
